name: Sir Truck
description:
Sir Truck uses WASD / Arrow keys to play. Sorry, mobile players!

Battle your way through hordes of enemies, collecting gold and levelling up to survive as long as you can.

  • 6 unlockable trophies
  • 6 weapons
  • 30+ Perks

Sir Truck was built as a prototype in 4 weeks, and is my first ever solo endeavour. I plan on making several prototypes, and whichever game gets the most support will be moved into full production. 

So if you like the game, show your support!
